original: 泰山梁父人，曹魏官員。史書對其幾無著墨，僅知其為司馬師妻羊徽瑜及名將羊祜之父，其妻孔氏、蔡氏，分別為孔融、蔡邕之女。
text: Father of Taishan Liang, Cao Wei official. There is little written on him in history books, except that he is the father of Sima's wife Yang Huiyu and the famous general Yang Hu, and his wife Kong and Cai are the daughters of Kong Rong and Cai Yong respectively.
